In the package you will find three downloadable PDF patterns from the Parkland Casual Menswear collection:      1. The Newcastle Cardigan      2. The Strathcona Henley and T-shirt      3. The Jedediah Pants and Shorts (Click on the links above to see the details for each pattern) These patterns, as part of the Parkland Casual Collection, are modern slim-fitting designs with athletic sizing. name: Newcastle Cardigan
description: For men who would like to stay cozy but look stylish - this shawl collar cardigan can look trendy or classic depending on the fabric choice. The sweater is slim fitting with long cuffed sleeves and a flattering fold-over shawl style collar. This piece sews up quickly in a forgiving knit and features several customizable details such as a shoulder and back yoke (easily included or left out), small or large collar, and decorative top-stitching. Instructions clearly indicate when certain details can be added or removed and contain tips on how to simplify sewing with knits. This pattern, as part of the Parkland Casual Collection, is a modern slim-fitting design with athletic sizing. It is a classic garment that lends itself to creating the perfect casual, hand-made wardrobe for an active lifestyle. The Newcastle Cardigan sewing pattern is available for instant download as a PDF! Upon receipt of payment, the pattern and instruction files will be e-mailed to you to print at home. Included in your purchase: 1) A detailed instruction booklet containing step-by-step instructions and diagrams 2) A print-at-home PDF pattern on 35 pages (suitable for both Letter and A4 size paper) 3) A 36" wide print shop PDF pattern Fabric Requirements * The fabric requirements for Variation 1 are all cut from the same fabric. Our instruction booklet provides you with fabric amounts for contrasting shoulder details as well. Version 1 Main Fabric:     3.2m (115cm wide) 2.4m (150cm wide) Interfacing:     2.4m Version 2 Main Fabric:     3.0m (115cm wide) 2.0m (150cm wide) Interfacing:     2.4m Check out more photos of the cardigan on our Blog!

name: Jedediah Pants
description: Chino-style trousers updated with a slim, casual fit, back yoke and stylish slash front pockets. These pants include two length options - knee length shorts with rolled cuff and full length trousers. They will wear well in a denim, corduroy or twill with the extra durability of flat fell seams. They could also be made in a lighter cotton or linen when sewn as summer shorts. The design includes top-stitched belt loops, flat fell inseams, a fly (with detailed illustrated sewing instructions), back patch pockets with customizable decorative stitching, and large slash front pockets. This pattern, as part of the Parkland Casual Collection, is a modern slim-fitting design with athletic sizing.
